Text: THANK YOU!!! At last; you're the first one ever to upload the Harry Potterbooks in their original language; now I can finally delete the American ones!
thank you very much, been looking for this!!
I downloaded the books but now I can't open them with adobe reader.Can someone please help me cause I really want this Uk version!
I really really want these as I HATE the American versions. However, when I download them they're just blank and won't open with preview (Mac). Any help?

Actually, please ignore my previous comment. Got it working with Adobe. 

Ok so where was I? Oh yes!

THANK YOU SO MUCH! Finally I can delete the awful American versions. Hurrah for correct spelling. I know it's silly, but it's so irritating reading it.
Torrent didn't want to start for a while until I force started it. They are awesome, I've always wanted to read the UK versions, and by the looks of the comments, they're better! Thanks! Seeding.
